title: SerensSoulYoga
features: Users can register as an instructor or student
Instructors can add and update classes based on feedback
Students can select and purchase classes
Admin can manage user roles and approve/deny classes

title: BabyCarCurias
features: User authentication with email & password and Google
Users can add and update content
Collaboration features and access to view all details

title: BolLagbe-Books Reselling
features: User authentication with email & password and Google GitHub
View details page of top chefs for logged-in users
View blogs and download PDF versions
